Conditions & Terms

Responsible And Commited

At Terghazi Contracting, We Believe That Each Project Is A Gloden Opportunity To Demonstrate our Management Capabliries ANd High Quality In Implementation And Design, An Opportunity To Build The Future, Support An Area, And Achieve Sustainable Benefits For The Women And Men Who Live And Work There, The Foundation Takes Advantages Of All These Opportunities. As Each Project Brings Its Own Potential To The Future, Our Teams Work Together Every Day With Our Partners And Customers To Imagine And Build Ambitious Solutions For Sustainable Development. While Each Of Our Sites Is Unique, Our Way Of Conducting Operations Adheres To Our Values:Responsibility And Commitment.

Being Commited

It Means Helping To Address - Through our Concrete Actions On The Ground - Major Societal Challenges, Prioritizing Local Employment And Professional Integration, Achieving Local Added Value Through Our Projects, opening Up To The Community ANd Establishing Partners, With A Comprehensive Focus On Slidarity. Build Trust Locally By Demonstrating Our Commitment Everywhere We Work. One Basic Ambition That Supports All Our Projects:Sharing Ideas And Inventing them.

Being Responsible

It Means Ensuring That We Fully Respect Our Customers, Collaborators, Environment And All Our Stakeholders. We Accomplish This Responsibility Every day through Individual And Collective Initiatives To protect The Health And Safety Of All On All Our Sites, Ensuring Flawless Ethical Behavior ANd Protecting The Environment In Our Country. we Are Building Opportunities To Be Perfect.

Morality

We Pledge to respect the Highest Standards In All Our Operators ANd Promote Ethics In Our Business Practices And Behavior Adminstrative.

Human Rights

Ensuring respect For Basic rights that Are Considered At Risk At All Stages Of Our Supply Chain.

Remote Control And Control Of Construction Sites

Design, Management, Operation, Maintainence, And on-site And Remote Monitoring Information Documents Have Been Produced That Define The Standard Comkpliance Requirements For The Basic Services we Need To Accomblish the Work, And Ensure COntrol At All Stages Of Implementation.

Diversity And Quality Of Life At Work.

We Adhere To The Principles Of Deversity And Quality Of Life At Work And Aim To Achieve the "Best Employer" Brand in Jordan And The World In The Future.

Introductions Of A Resposnible Purchasing Policy

The Policy Designed To Be A Mean Of communicating The Community Of The Procurement Dmision Within The Priorities Of The Responsible And Commited Instituation To All Concerned. the Aim Is To Commit The Supplier ANd Buyer To The Main Pillars Of Quality Associated With The Best Prices And Specifications.
